title: What other games do you play?

replies.body: None, apart from hexxit
replies.body_tagged: None, apart from hexxit

replies.body:
- Pokemon
- Occasionally some Mario games
- Mario Kart (Wii, 7, sometimes 64)
- Ocarina of Time (original)
- Majora's Mask (Wii port)
- Super Smash Bros (Brawl, Melee, and Project M)
- Team Fortress 2
- Dark Souls 2
- Games on my phone

Yeah... I'm a Nintendo fanboy :3
